column1: Smoque BBQ////Every time I drive by Smoque the line is out of this world. Yesterday driving to another restaurant my husband pointed out there was no line
column2: and just like that we finally made it happen! The food is as delicious as other reviewer have said
column3: and the best part was the price! They have very reasonable prices and large portions. I had the half rack or ribs with fries and mac and cheese
column4: and my husband had the brisket. Everything was delicious. I wouldn't wait in line though
column5: because I've been to other places in the city that I find equally good or better (tone honest). If you're in the neighborhood and you're lucky enough to get in without a wait...go for it!
